title: Interest ) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A –
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings – Extension of Period of 
Effect) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (face covering - extension period effect) regulation 2022

title: Interest ) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary
text_raw:
2. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings on Public Transport) Regulations 
2020 (S.I. No. 244 of 2020) is amended by the substitution of “28th day of 
February 2022” for “9th day of February 2022”.
text_norm: 2 regulation 2 health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (face covering public transport) regulation 2020 (s.i no 244 2020) amended substitution 28th day february 2022 9th day february 2022

Certain Premises) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 569 of 2020) is amended, in

of February 2022”.

Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) 
(No. 2) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 571 of 2020) is amended, in paragraph (2), 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in

 by the substitution of “28th day of February 2022” for “9th day of February

title: Interest ) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings on Public Transport) Regulations 
2020 ( S.I. No. 244 of 2020 ), the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) 
Regulations 2020 ( S.I. No. 296 of 2020 ), the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Small Public Service 
Vehicles and Certain Premises) Regulations 2020 ( S.I. No. 569 of 2020 ), and 
the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face 
Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) (No. 2) Regulations 2020 ( S.I. 
No. 571 of 2020 ) to provide that their operation is extended to 28th February
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) regulation amend health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (face covering public transport) regulation 2020 ( s.i no 244 2020 ) health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (face covering certain premise businesses) regulation 2020 ( s.i no 296 2020 ) health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (face covering small public service vehicle certain premises) regulation 2020 ( s.i no 569 2020 ) health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (face covering certain premise businesses) (no 2) regulation 2020 ( s.i no 571 2020 ) provide operation extended 28th february
